text: Awon t’o n gbe ninu ilu Modinah, ti won si ni igbagbo ododo siwaju won, won nifee awon t’o fi ilu Mokkah sile wa si odo won (ni ilu Modinah). Won ko si ni bukata kan ninu igba-aya won si nnkan ti won fun won. Won si n gbe ajulo fun won lori emi ara won, koda ki o je pe awon gan-an ni bukata (si ohun ti won fun won). Enikeni ti A ba so nibi ahun ati okanjua inu emi re, awon wonyen, awon ni olujere
